Job Title: Salesforce Field Service Solution Architect

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Information Technology

Description:
Who Are We?ForeFront is a global systems integration and enterprise digital transformation firm that provides a broad range of solutions utilizing the Salesforce Manufacturing Cloud, Revenue Cloud, Service Cloud, Field Service, Commerce Cloud, Experience Cloud, Health Cloud, Automotive Cloud and other technologies.
Our strong experience and deep knowledge of the Salesforce multi-cloud platforms give us the ability to solve complex challenges in the manufacturing, automotive, energy, healthcare/life sciences, consumer packaged goods (CPG), and technology/software industries.
This broad technology prowess and deep industry experience fuel a 25-year history of success. And with 15 years as a Salesforce Partner (Gold level), we work closely with Salesforce to deliver innovative B2B Commerce, Quote-to-Cash and Asset Lifecycle Management and other sophisticated solutions.
Headquartered in Fair Haven, N.J., and with talented, highly experienced professionals in cities across the United States and in Europe, we work every day to keep our market-leading client companies At the ForeFront.
To learn more about our company, solutions, services, and people, go to forefrontcorp.com.
What Will You Be Doing?ForeFront is looking for a creative and highly motivated Solutions Architect with an entrepreneurial spirit, strong technical skills, and business acumen to apply your expertise in implementing complex partner applications.
The Solutions Architect (SA) is a key member of the Client Delivery Team, providing clients with in-depth product knowledge throughout client engagements. The SA will communicate closely with key clients to create and understand technical solutions, prepare and present demonstrations, assess technical requirements and the business process environment of prospects, perform deep discovery related to the prospect's application requirements, prepare solution proposals (SOW's and Project Scoping), and respond to RFXs. The SA will assume responsibility of SOW estimates. The SA will also be expected to act as the VOC during product road map reviews. This role will also be accountable for technical strategic planning and account development as the transfer of Forefront product and solutions skills to the client progresses.
Key Responsibilities:Provide technical and industry expertise with Salesforce Field ServiceArchitect the design of the scope of the CRM solutionDevelop high-quality solution deliverables that clearly articulate the solutionResponsible for driving the development of refined Business Requirements
What You Need for This Position:3+ years’ experience implementing Salesforce Field Service solutionsStrong written & verbal communication skills to collaborate effectively with clients and development teamIn-depth Technical knowledge with database management systems, development environments & object-oriented systems, operating systemsExperience within manufacturing, automotive, energy, healthcare/life sciences, consumer packaged goods (CPG), and technology/software industriesStrong understanding and competency in Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions sales. Having worked with a SI a plusAbility to develop and deliver high-quality presentations and demos via the internet and/or in-personStrong problem solving, design abilities and system evaluations in order to analyze the scalability of system architecture
Why Join Us?We offer flexible on-site, client-site and remote work, a supportive culture that enables our people to do their best work, a client portfolio that offers challenging and innovative projects, an environment with the opportunity to collaborate and connect with other talented professionals, and, most important, a role that lets you grow as an individual.
We foster a sense of Team. We believe our people are the key to our continued success. And we live our values every day. The result is that for four consecutive years (2019, 2020, 2021, 2022) ForeFront was named one of New Jersey’s Best Places to Work – consistently ranked in the top 10.
What’s In It For You?
You can be yourself. We promote and support a culture of camaraderie, pride, inclusion, diversity and respect.
You will be challenged. Our complex projects and advanced technologies require intelligence, innovation and continuous learning.
You will be supported. We provide every employee with a competitive salary and benefit package, and a culture that values work-life balance.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
